message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your organization. Given its immense worth of $15,000 to you, I propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $14,500. This exclusive opportunity is designed to ensure you receive unparalleled benefits while also maximizing your investment. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget, so we can proceed to finalize the transaction.
